question: Arrange the Nationalist Congress Party, Rashtriya Janata Dal, Bahujan Samaj Party, Samajwadi Party in chronological order of the years they were founded:
option1: Nationalist Congress Party, Rashtriya Janata Dal, Bahujan Samaj Party, Samajwadi Party
option2: Bahujan Samaj Party, Samajwadi Party, Rastriya Janta Dal, Nationalist Congress Party
option3: Bahujan Samaj Party, Samajwadi Party, Nationalist Congress Party,Rastriya Janta Dal,
option4: Bahujan Samaj Party, Nationalist Congress Party, Rastriya Janta Dal, Samajwadi Party
answer: Bahujan Samaj Party, Samajwadi Party, Rastriya Janta Dal, Nationalist Congress Party
